List of GSAS-II tutorials

    A list of available tutorials appears below. Each tutorial is a web page that can be opened using the link below, but most tutorials also need to have example data files downloaded. This can also be done with links included below, but it can be easier to access tutorials using Help/Tutorials menu item. When this menu entry is used from inside GSAS-II (unless "browse tutorial on web" is selected), the data files are downloaded to a local directory and GSAS-II will start from that directory for most file open commands.

Getting started

  • Starting GSAS-II [No exercise files].

Rietveld fitting

  • Fitting laboratory X-ray powder data for fluoroapatite [link: Exercise files].
  • CW Neutron Powder fit for Yttrium-Iron Garnet [link: Exercise files].
  • Combined X-ray/CW-neutron refinement of PbSO4 [link: Exercise files].
  • Combined X-ray/TOF-neutron Rietveld refinement [link: Exercise files].
  • Fitting the Starting Background using Fixed Points [link: Exercise files].
  • Simulating Powder Diffraction with GSAS-II [link: Exercise files].
  • Determining Starting Profile Parameters from a Standard [link: Exercise files].
    • This shows how to determine approximate profile parameters by fitting individual peaks with data collected on a standard using a lab diffractometer.

Parametric Rietveld fitting

  • Sequential refinement of multiple datasets [link: Exercise files].
    • Parametric Fitting and Pseudo Variables for Sequential Fits * [No exercise files].

Structure solution

  • Fitting individual peaks & autoindexing [link: Exercise files].
    • Charge Flipping structure solution for jadarite * [No exercise files].
    • Charge Flipping structure solution for sucrose * [No exercise files].
  • Charge Flipping structure solution with Xray single crystal data [link: Exercise files].
  • Charge flipping with neutron TOF single crystal data [link: Exercise files].
  • Monte-Carlo simulated annealing structure determination [link: Exercise files].

Stacking Fault Modeling

  • Stacking fault simulations for diamond [No exercise files].
  • Stacking fault simulations for Keokuk kaolinite [link: Exercise files].
  • Stacking fault simulations for Georgia kaolinite [link: Exercise files].

Image Calibration/Integration

  • Calibration of an area detector [link: Exercise files].
    • Integration of area detector data * [No exercise files].
  • Calibration of a Neutron TOF diffractometer [link: Exercise files].

Small-Angle Scattering

  • Strain fitting of 2D data [link: Exercise files].
  • Texture analysis of 2D data [link: Exercise files].
  • Small angle x-ray data size distribution (alumina powder) [link: Exercise files].
    • Fitting small angle x-ray data (alumina powder) * [link: Exercise files].
  • Image Processing of small angle x-ray data [link: Exercise files].
  • Sequential refinement with small angle scattering data [link: Exercise files].

Other

  • Merohedral twin refinements [link: Exercise files].
  • Single crystal refinement from TOF data [link: Exercise files].
  • Scripting a GSAS-II Refinement from Python [link: Exercise files].
    • Running a GSAS-II Refinement from the Command Line * [link: Exercise files].
* Indented tutorials require the previous unindented tutorial as a prerequisite
